title: 77: The Case Against Adnan Syed Part 1: Forbidden Love
itunes:title: The Case Against Adnan Syed Part 1: Forbidden Love
description:
Directed by Academy Award nominee Amy Berg, The Case Against Adnan Syed will explore the 1999 disappearance and murder of 18-year-old Baltimore County high school student Hae Min Lee, and the subsequent conviction of her ex-boyfriend, Adnan Syed, a case brought to global attention by the hugely popular Serial podcast.

In Part 1, we meet Adnan, Hae, and their friends in the magnet program at Woodlawn high school. When Hae disappears and then is found dead several weeks later, Adnan becomes the prime suspect in her murder. But there is also Don, the boyfriend of only 10 days who may have been the last person to see her alive. New investigators TRACK DON DOWN and attempt to get his side of the story. 

To hear our brand new interview with Rabia Chaurdry, our interview with Asia Mcclain, and our episode-by-episode coverage of "Serial," become a TCO Patron for just $5 per month! You'll instantly get all this PLUS over 60 other full bonus episodes!

To learn about the recent developments in the Adnan Syed case go here and check out the "Crime Writers On" update here.

Come to our June Pride show! We're celebrating the 50th anniversary of Stonewall by covering the definitive documentary "Stonewall Uprising." Tickets are going fast! Click her to join us!
